title: Zombified Book Two: Shady Oaks
description: Mick Carter and his family move to Shady Oaks and immediately immerse themselves in small-town life. As part of their new reality - whether fighting zombies, bringing survivors to town, or growing a backyard garden - everyone has an important job to do. Shady Oaks begins to recover, but zombies and the Connor Group once again rear their menacing heads to threaten all they now hold dear. As chaos erupts around them, they must pull together in order to survive. Can they protect not only the residents of Shady Oaks, but their new life as well?
author: Char Robinson
